alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:16PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Teller and west central El Paso Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 316 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Divide, or 19 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodland Park around 320 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Green Mountain Falls, Crystola, Chipita Park, Cascade and Pikes Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
